Title: Requires the metropolitan transportation authority to provide more detailed information to the public on its website
Summary: Requires the metropolitan transportation authority to provide more detailed information to the public on its website regarding specific subway line performance and capacity.
LawCode: Amd ยง1276-e, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public authorities law, in relation to requiring the metropolitan transportation authority to provide more detailed information to the public on its website
